text: Adventures of Sonic the Hedgehog, otherwise referred to as Sonic the Hedgehog, Adventures of Sonic or Sonic for short, is a 1993 animated series. It was created by DiC in 1992, then aired the next year. The show is about Sonic the Hedgehog and Tails the Fox to stop Dr Robotnik. It aired from September 6th, 1993 to December 3rd, 1993. == Characters == * Sonic is the main character of the series. He is a blue hedgehog and is very fast like in his games. * Tails is a double tailed fox and is the Sidekick character of the series. He has the ability to fly. Category:American animated television series
title: Adventures of Sonic the Hedgehog
